## StaticFilterOptionConfig type

The configuration data for a field value static filter option.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type StaticFilterOptionConfig = Omit<FilterOptionConfig, 'matcher' | 'value'> & {
    value: string | number | boolean;
};
```
